mapper.update: update staff set staff_jnum = #{staffJnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, staff_password = #{staffPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, staff_name = #{staffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, staff_authority = #{staffAuthority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, staff_state = #{staffState,jdbcType=INTEGER} where staff_id = #{staffId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select staff_id, staff_jnum, staff_password, staff_name, staff_authority, staff_state from staff
